alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:19PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pinal County through 200 PM MST... At 118 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mammoth, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mammoth and Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness. This includes Route 77 between mile markers 114 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
